Postman: API platform for building and using APIs
charles: is an HTTP proxy / HTTP monitor / Reverse Proxy that enables a developer to view all of the HTTP and SSL / HTTPS traffic between their machine and the Internet
fiddler: Debugging features are supercharged in Fiddler Everywhere, allowing you to take debugging and testing to the next level without any added effort
dev_tools: is a set of web developer tools built directly into the Google Chrome browser
